title: Love Island’s Amber Gill too busy securing the bag to worry about romance
text:
Amber Gill and Greg O’Shea split just five weeks after Love Island (Picture: Rex)

Amber Gill and Greg O’Shea shocked fans with their split, just five weeks after they won Love Island together.

And, while the make-up artist has been linked to a string of men after the break-up, she has insisted she’s way too busy securing the bag to be thinking of jumping into another relationship.

Well, she has just penned a £1million deal with Miss Pap…

Speaking exclusively to Metro.co.uk about her clothing launch, the 22-year-old lifted the lid on whether anyone had been sliding into her DMs.

‘No, my DMs haven’t been that popping…,’ she told us. ‘They haven’t been great.

‘I’m not really interested in that at the minute. They improved after we split up, but nobody [messaged] that I wanted to reply to. That’s going to be really harsh to people that sent a message…’

Amber signed a £1million deal with Miss Pap (Picture: Splash)

Good to know, hun.

Advertisement

Advertisement

There are just a handful of couples from this year’s Love Island still together, with Belle Hassan and Anton Danyluk, and Chris Taylor and Harley Brash, also calling time on their romances.

Discussing why everyone has found it so hard to stay coupled up, Amber admitted it’s a lot harder outside the safety of the Majorcan villa.

‘I think when you get out, it’s harder than what you anticipate it’s going to be,’ she continued. ‘I think that it’s a lot of pressure.

‘Everybody had a certain lifestyle before they went in and it’s completely different to when they come out.

‘It’s hard to get to grips with that, and get to know someone in a relationship-sense.’

But the ITV2 star isn’t dwelling on her split from rugby player Greg, and has been living her best life in Miami while shooting her Miss Pap collection.

Oh, and going for breakfast with Tyler The Creator while over there…

As you do.

Joking about all the speculation surrounding their meet-up, she added: ‘It was just a breakfast! Something happened and we ended up meeting each other…

‘It was crazy, what are the chances?’

Amber Gill’s Miss Pap collection is available now.
